metadata.title: CVE-2024-12087 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
[Server can make client write files outside of destination directory usingsymbolic links]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-12087` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rsync - 3.1.2-2.1ubuntu1.6+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: rsync package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-2.1ubuntu1.6+esm1').
